title: Get off your fat ass
dialogue: It's time to get the fuck up.

title: Rise and shine
dialogue: A constant flow of notifications has woken you up. Find your phone to see what's going on.

title: Gotta go, and fast!
dialogue: You found your phone in the closet! There's tons of embarrassing pictures online! Go outside to find out what happened.

title: Fisrt!!1
dialogue: You want to go to the pub for intel. Stop by your friend Ian's house first!

title: One more can't hurt, right?
dialogue: You've met up with Ian, now go to the pub.

title: Let's get fucked up!
dialogue: You've reached the pub! Time to get wasted!

title: Noni's Drunk Adventure
dialogue: Noni is bragging about being cooler than you. Hell no. Kick his ass with this broken beer bottle. Equip it first!

title: Maknig your way downtown
dialogue: You decide you need to take down the person that put the pictures online. Head to PiPi HQ.

title: Noni's drunk, again
dialogue: Right after you step in, a drunk Noni is there to greet you and challenges you to combat (again) to prove he is indeed cooler than you

title: Leader, oh, leader, where art thou?
dialogue: Now that you've defeated Noni, you decide to look for the leader of Pi Pi so you can defeat him too.

title: Walking fast, FaceBeerTM pass
dialogue: As Meemstar draws his last breath, he tells you that the only way to remove the embarrassing pictures from the internet is to destroy the servers at FaceBeer

title: Thank you, come again
dialogue: Now that you're here, kindly ask the person at the service desk if you can take a look at the server room. Also, maybe take that pen.

title: Hackerman
dialogue: He said no. He doesn't seem to be paying attention though. Just try and walk in.
